alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 8:30PM CDT until July 14 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Marshall County in central Illinois... North central Woodford County in central Illinois... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 830 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Varna, or 12 miles east of Lacon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wenona around 840 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 39 between mile markers 29 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
